title: AbstractReferenceLevel
description: A reference level or horizontal reference surface definition, which can be used embedded in other schemas.

Height.title: Height
Height.description: The height above the reference surface defined by the VerticalCoordinateReferenceSystemID positive upwards.

VerticalCoordinateReferenceSystemID.title: Vertical Coordinate Reference System ID
VerticalCoordinateReferenceSystemID.description: The relationship to the vertical CRS defining the absolute reference surface.

EffectiveDateTime.title: Effective Date Time
EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time at which this reference level instance becomes effective.

TerminationDateTime.title: Termination Date Time
TerminationDateTime.description: The date and time at which a reference level instance is no longer in effect.

VerticalMeasurementTypeID.title: Vertical Measurement Type ID
VerticalMeasurementTypeID.description: Specifies the type of vertical measurement (SRD, ES, GR, MSL,and many more).

VerticalMeasurementPathID.title: Vertical Measurement Path ID
VerticalMeasurementPathID.description: When used in context of a Wellbore, this specifies Measured Depth, True Vertical Depth, or Elevation.

VerticalMeasurementSourceID.title: Vertical Measurement Source ID
VerticalMeasurementSourceID.description: When used in context of a Wellbore this specifies Driller vs Logger measurements.

WellboreTVDTrajectoryID.title: Wellbore TVD Trajectory ID
WellboreTVDTrajectoryID.description: When used in context of a Wellbore this specifies what directional survey or wellpath was used to calculate the TVD.

VerticalUncertainty.title: Vertical Uncertainty
VerticalUncertainty.description: The positional uncertainty in the vertical direction.

SeismicReplacementVelocity.title: Seismic Replacement Velocity
SeismicReplacementVelocity.description: The replacement velocity value used to produce vertical static shifts in seismic data.
